news.title: LARAbEL announces Dublin and Galway gigs
news.summary: The Donegal artist released her debut EP Squiggle this month

news.title: Live Report: The Lemonheads leave The Academy with mixed emotions
news.summary: Back in Dublin for the first time in three years, The Lemonheads gave The Academy something to talk about.

news.title: Jenna Ortega: "Everything about Ireland was so beautiful"
news.summary: Revered director Tim Burton, and stars Jenna Ortega and Steve Buscemi, discuss the hotly anticipated second season of Netflix smash Wednesday.

news.title: Lil Nas X pleads not guilty to assault charges
news.summary: A Los Angeles Judge set the rappers bail for $75,000

news.title: The Wind That Shakes The Barley screenwriter arrested for wearing 'Genocide in Palestine, time to take Action' t-shirt
news.summary: Paul Laverty’s T-shirt allegedly referenced the UK-proscribed protest group Palestine Action.

news.title: KNEECAP to release new single 'Sayõnara' with Orbital's Paul Hartnoll on 12" vinyl
news.summary: The 12" – which also features 'The Recap' – is available to pre-order now.

news.title: Nerves: "As a nation, we don’t have much to be proud about in terms of what our government is doing"
news.summary: Ahead of releasing their superb new EP Iarmhaireacht, Nerves discuss becoming a four-piece, Irish identity and Palestine.

news.title: Loathe announce Dublin and Belfast show
news.summary: They will play Belfast’s Limelight 1 on December 1 and Dublin’s The Academy On December 2, 2025.

news.title: David Keenan: "This year it’s going to be my freest and wildest Electric Picnic performance"
news.summary: As part of our special Festival Voices series, David Keenan looks ahead to Electric Picnic 2025...
